meanings.definition: Engaging in recreational activities for enjoyment or amusement.
meanings.sent1: She loves playing with her toys in the park.
meanings.sent2: The children were playing tag in the playground.
meanings.sent3: The family had a great time playing board games together.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room as she was playing with her friends.
meanings.sent5: The sound of children playing echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Participating in a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: The playing kids were having fun at the soccer field.
meanings.sent2: The playing team won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The playing athletes showed great sportsmanship.
meanings.sent4: The playing players gave their all in the match.
meanings.sent5: The playing competitors were determined to win.

meanings.sent1: She enjoys playing the piano in her free time.
meanings.sent2: The band was playing a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent3: The musician was playing a catchy tune on the guitar.
meanings.sent4: The orchestra was playing a symphony at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The guitarist was playing with passion and skill.

meanings.sent1: The playing children were pretending to be pirates.
meanings.sent2: The playing friends were lost in their imaginary world.
meanings.sent3: The playing kids had a tea party with their stuffed animals.
meanings.sent4: The playing siblings were on a make-believe adventure.
meanings.sent5: The playing group of kids were exploring a magical kingdom.
